author: Adam Vaughan
title: Greta: We must fight the climate crisis and pandemic simultaneously
description: In an exclusive interview, climate activist Greta Thunberg has told New Scientist that the coronavirus pandemic shows we can act quickly in an emergency
content:
By Adam Vaughan
Swedish environmental activist Greta Thunberg says we must guard against inaction on climate issues while fighting the coronavirus pandemic
Monasse Thierry/ANDBZ/ABACA/PA Images
The world needs to tackle the coronavirus pandemic and climate… [+406 chars]
